23 #pragma once

25 #include <windows.h>

28 #include <ostream>

32 
33 // This is a wrapper to make ::OutputDebugStringA behave like std::ostream
34 // Derived from code written by Sven Axelsson
35 // Documented: http://www.codeproject.com/KB/debug/debugout.aspx
36 
37 namespace cinder { namespace msw {
38 
39 template <class CharT, class TraitsT = std::char_traits<CharT> >
40 class basic_debugbuf :
41  public std::basic_stringbuf<CharT, TraitsT>
42 {
43 public:
44 
45  virtual ~basic_debugbuf() {
46  sync();
47  }
48 
49 protected:
50  int sync() {
51  output_debug_string(str().c_str());
52  str(std::basic_string<CharT>()); // Clear the string buffer
53 
54  return 0;
55  }
56 
57  void output_debug_string(const CharT *text) {}
58 };
59 
60 template<>
61 void basic_debugbuf<char>::output_debug_string(const char *text)
62 {
63  ::OutputDebugStringA(text);
64 }
65 
66 template<>
67 void basic_debugbuf<wchar_t>::output_debug_string(const wchar_t *text)
68 {
69  ::OutputDebugStringW(text);
70 }
71 
72 template<class CharT, class TraitsT = std::char_traits<CharT> >
73 class basic_dostream :
74  public std::basic_ostream<CharT, TraitsT>
75 {
76 public:
77 
78  basic_dostream() : std::basic_ostream<CharT, TraitsT>
79  (new basic_debugbuf<CharT, TraitsT>()) {}
80  ~basic_dostream()
81  {
82  delete rdbuf();
83  }
84 };
85 
86 typedef basic_dostream<char> dostream;
87 typedef basic_dostream<wchar_t> wdostream;
88 
89 } } // namespace cinder::msw
